author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
It's 30 Years since the original Warhammer Quest hit the shelves back in 1995 and Games Workshop is back with a sleek new modernized version of the classic game of dungeon adventure. How modern? Will it appeal to QUEST95 players? Let's check find out!

Big thanks to GW for a complimentary copy of the box to review. 

#AdWIP

#WarhammerQuest

title: GMG Reviews - WARHAMMER QUEST: Darkwater by Games Workshop

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
It's 30 Years since the original Warhammer Quest hit the shelves back in 1995 and Games Workshop is back with a sleek new modernized version of the classic game of dungeon adventure. Workshop included a handy Tutorial scenario whic I'm running as a 'Session Zero' for Act One so you guys can check out the core game. Let's check it out!

Big thanks to GW for a complimentary copy of the box to review.

title: Let's Play! - WARHAMMER QUEST - Darkwater by Games Workshop

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
It's QUESTIN' TIME! The Heroes have made their way into the grounds of the Jade Abbey and find themselves beset by the followers of FOULHOOF the shaman as the followers of Pust defend their conquest to defile the Everspring. Let's jump in and set up a campaign for WARHAMMER QUEST: DARKWATER.

Big thanks to GW for a complimentary copy of the box to review.
